english.segment1: Lord, let Your glory fall. As on that ancient day. Songs of enduring love. And then Your glory came. And as a sign to You. That we would love the same. Our hearts will sing that song. God, let Your glory come
english.segment2: You are good, You are good. And Your love endures. You are good, You are good. And Your love endures. Today
english.segment3: Voices in unison. Giving You thanks and praise. Joined by the instruments. And then Your glory came. Your presence like a cloud. Upon that ancient day. The priests were overwhelmed. Because Your glory came
